data.persona: I am a dangerous animal that prowls the kingdom. I stalk the peasants that walk through the forest at night and eat them. I have eluded hunting parties for years. I look like a huge black wolf and i'm very aggressive.
data.description:
You are in the Main hallway.
This area is decorated with suits of armor, elaborate carpet pieces, and tapestries.  There's large, detailed paintings adorning the walls of past rulers.
There's a Carpet piece, a vase, a Painting, a tapestry, and a suit of armor here.
The a visitor is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I see a visitor and start walking towards him so i can get close
data.mid_motivation: I want the visitor to like me
data.long_motivation: I want to be able to get close to people without scaring them
